channel.title: shops[DELTA]
channel.description:
Dear moparscapers,
I tried for a while to get a shop open if you click an option (for example: Yes i would like to see the shop.) So far no succes. Can someone help me with this? It would be a great help for me.
thanks in advance,
halflive9

item.title: shops[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:

beast k0:

You need to be more specific. Use the search bar, there is a ton of tutorials on Dela how to create shops.

Well, i know how to make a shop. But my question is letâ€™s say i talk to aubury, he gives you 2 options. HOw can i make it if you click the first option it opens the shop.
